title: Game Freezing
body: Hello, I have this another problem. My patching and logins are fine, but once I login into the game, I click the "PLAY" Button, I chose a game mode and when I am waiting for a match (You know like the time when you wait) My client freezes. I have to reboot my PC over and over again. Please help!!

replies.body:
I know how to fix it for me. I'll try to explain it in English. 
1) Go to your desktop and right click on the LoL pictogram. 
2) Fix compability problems (not sure how to translate this properly).
3) Use recommended settings.
4) Test program.

Since the Windows update I have to start LoL every time this way. The theory behind this, according to someone else, is that it runs LoL through a Windows 7 version.
I have Windows 10, does that method still work?

> [{quoted}](name=Alohaxrick,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=achtF8P7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-25T22:04:26.323+0000)
>
> I have Windows 10, does that method still work?

There are 2 features inside Windows 10 that may be causing issues. The first is the windows game bar, which recently had a feature enabled called *Game DVR*. I recommend [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if this fixes the issue. If it doesn't I suggest [disabling the SmartScreen filter](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168) that has been causing similar issues for some Windows 8 - 10 players as of recent.

Let me know if either of those worked.

Please confirm if your symptoms are similar
